messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Whether there are problems or not, or
if crimes have been committed or not, I still go out on patrol.
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Big trouble! Officer in need
of assistance!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Your toughness is too much!
I’m in serious trouble!
messages.TRMSG_NOT_NIGHT_UNUSED:
I don’t know how to say this, but
maybe we patrol too much.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Let me ask you a question!
Are you tough enough to take me?
